title: The Best Time Travel Stories of All Time
description: Features fourteen classic time travel stories including Nancy Kress's "The Battle of Long Island," Poul Anderson's "A Little Something for Us Tempunauts," and Robert Silverberg's "Hawksbill Station," as well as works by Damon Knight Philip K. Dick, Jack Dann, and other notables. Original.
author: Barry N. Malzberg
